*** Bug 13175 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Welcome page content is owned by releng.

In addition to the error it looks like the lines of the new content are too 
short compaired to the other content. Cr's are honored (unlike html) so put 
them where you want them.
*** Bug 13361 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Will this be fixed in today's build?
We keep getting PRs in about it.

This should be fixed in today's build.  The fix went into the 0410 nightly 
build.
